sys_ui_message.message:
If you want to override values in a catalog item, select Set Property Override as the Action type. These value types are supported:
  • Static Values: a constant value that is assigned to the selected property.
  • Expressions: a value based on other objects in the system. You can do the following
    1. Set form data values using definition expressions. For example: ${parameter.formData.CatalogAttributeType}
    2. Assign user data values using definition expressions. For example: ${parameter.userData.userId}
    3. Set Stack/table values using runtime expressions. For example: $(ci.sn_cmp_ip_pool[subnet=${parameter.formData.SubnetId}])
    4. Set Stack/table values using runtime expressions. For example: ${randomNumber}
You can also concatenate a static value with an expression.
